byline.contributor: Quentin Hardy and Evelyn M. Rusli contributed reporting.

abstract: Research in Motion continues effort to restore service for BlackBerry customers on five continents; RIM says services have been restored to United States customers; company is fending off growing number of upset investors who are calling for exploration of strategic options and new leadership.
snippet: The trouble couldn’t come at a worse time for Research in Motion, as the handset maker faces a shrinking market share and agitated investors.
lead_paragraph: The trouble couldn’t come at a worse time for Research in Motion, as the handset maker faces a shrinking market share and agitated investors.

headline.main: BlackBerry’s Service Hiccups Spread; Five Continents Affected
headline.print_headline: BlackBerry’s Service Hiccups Spread; Five Continents Affected
headline.seo: Hiccups in BlackBerry Service Spread; Five Continents Affected
